RULE.TEXT: IF (Arousal IS Low OR Arousal IS Middle-Low OR Arousal IS High OR Arousal IS Middle-High OR Arousal IS Very-High) AND (Valence IS Middle-High) THEN Fun IS Low
IF (Arousal IS Very-Low OR Arousal IS Middle-Low OR Arousal IS High OR Arousal IS Middle-High OR Arousal IS Very-High) AND (Valence IS Middle-High) THEN Fun IS Low
IF (Arousal IS Low OR Arousal IS Middle-Low OR Arousal IS High OR Arousal IS Middle-High OR Arousal IS Very-High) AND (Valence IS High) THEN Fun IS Middle
IF (Valence IS Very-Low) THEN Fun IS Very-Low
IF (Valence IS Low) THEN Fun IS Very-Low
IF (Arousal IS Very-Low) AND (Valence IS Middle-High) THEN Fun IS Very-Low
IF (Arousal IS Low) AND (Valence IS Middle-High) THEN Fun IS Very-Low
IF (Arousal IS Very-Low) AND (Valence IS High) THEN Fun IS Low
IF (Valence IS Middle-Low) THEN Fun IS Very-Low
IF (Valence IS Very-High) THEN Fun IS High
